2022 Blue Royal Enfield Meteor Super Nova 350 , , A brand that you don't run across often enough. Royal Enfield started production in 1901 and is responsible for the Royal Enfield Bullet, which became the longest-lived motorcycle design ever. The company has changed quite a bit over the years but these folks know a thing or two about the basic two wheeled transportation device that we know and love as the motorcycle.The Meteor is equipped with a 349cc, fuel injected, air cooled single cylinder engine that develops almost all of it's torque at 1800 rpm, which is perfect for an in town commuter. Weighing in at just 421 pounds, the 350 is a light , easy to handle motorcycle. Don't let the Retro looks, heritage or styling deceive you though, this is a thoroughly modern machine. A 5 speed transmission with toe and heel shifting and chain final drive for efficiently and low maintenance. The engine from the factory will not allow this bike to exceed 75 mph which provides quite a few advantages. 1-you can't go crazy fast to kill yourself, 2-you should be able to prevent yourself from receiving a speeding ticket, and 3-there is absolutely zero chance of red-lining, so your engine will not self-destruct! Disc brakes front and rear bring you to a halt. The comfort of this seat, passenger as well, exceeds that of the Honda Rebel and you could easily ride it for hours and miles without discomfort. Technology includes ABS, a halogen headlight, a L.E.D. brake light, and a small screen located next to the analog speedometer functions as a GPS using the Royal Enfield App and a second clock. Throw in about 60 mpg and the Meteor 350 is worth checking out, especially this Super Nova model. Straightforward and retro, these are cool bikes.Exclusively used for commute to and from work, over 100 miles each way! Serviced 3 times and, mileage wise, most recently. New spare oil filters included. Garaged 100% when not being ridden. Comes with original 2 keys. One owner with cleared clean Nevada Title paperwork.
